column4: you probably won't need a new power supply, but you'll need an IDE to SATA adapter (most sata drives come w/ them I do believe)
why should i get a ide-to-sata adapter. i wnt a sata card so i can plug in sata hdds from now on, instead of buying expensive ide
i want to go away from ide
you said you were poor, i was trying to give you the cheapest solution.
ah ok
have you considered just saving the bones to build a new cheap PC?
i got this pc for $50 bucks, gettign a new one would be $150 over that, with the sata and such capability at least
well how old is the $50 PC?
its a pentium 4
yeah... well, by the time you buy all the crap to make it work w/ SATA, you probably could have built a cheaper one.
im seriosuly consiodering a new one
i just hate having to buy old hardware, i keep getting gyped
well, yeah..
it doesn't have to be bleeding edge..
i got a dead pvr150 and no way to refund
it shows up on lspci but doesnt do anything
how are you attempting to use it?....
pvr150, to record tv
what program are you trying to use it w/?
oh you mean my pc? as a fileserver and expandable up to a htpc if need arises
mytht
mythtv
